newsitem.title: USA: Helm Resources ends Interpak sale talks.
newsitem.headline: Helm Resources ends Interpak sale talks.

text.p: Helm Resources Inc said on Monday that it ended talks with InterSystems Inc about the proposed sale of its Interpak unit because the parties were unable to agree on a sale price.
Helm said it was now discussing the sale of Interpak with a group led by the operating management of Interpak.
